https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ybnBNk3bHLiQM4zBafbhq1QJEsF.jpg Veteran radio, theatre, television and film actor Christopher Plummer has played a thousand parts, but beneath that elegant stage presence lies the restless heart of a risk-taker. Don't miss this engaging biography. Christopher Plummer: A Man For All Stages
